title: Rapid Industrial Growth
description: In 2022, Guyana experienced an impressive industrial growth rate of 98.53%, marking one of the highest growth rates globally.

title: Minimal CO2 Emissions from Waste
description: As of 2023, Guyana's carbon dioxide emissions from waste were among the lowest in the world, totaling just 0.0001 Mt CO2e.

title: High Vulnerability to Sea Level Rise
description: In 2015, 78.48% of Guyana's population lived in areas below 5 meters elevation, indicating a high vulnerability to sea level rise.

title: Low Hydroelectric Power Production
description: In 2021, hydroelectric sources contributed only 0.0008% to Guyana's total electricity production, one of the lowest globally.

title: Minimal Industrial Design Innovation
description: Guyana had only 1 resident industrial design application in 2021, indicating limited innovation in industrial design.

title: Stable GDP Deflator
description: In 2023, Guyana's GDP deflator was 91.02, reflecting a stable price level compared to other countries.
